title: Are holidays for Durga Puja or Diwali offered in BITS? - Quora
tags: BITS Pilani, K. K. Birla Goa Campus
Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani

response.answer_text: I am writing this w.r.t. Hyderabad Campus Here we have one holiday for Diwali and that's about it. If you decide to stay on campus on Diwali, you'll get to eat a special Gala dinner, enjoy DJ Night, burn crackers and enjoy the seasonal lights that are put on hostels and acad block. For durga puja we don't get a holiday but generally we get pandals and a celebratory mini fair sort of which has street food vendors and some games, all organized by the Bengali Regional Association (at least that's what happened last year) I hope this answers your query.
